thread.title: Surfing on land? Airwheel M3 PRO Electric Skateboards Complete makes it come true.
thread.title_full: Surfing on land? Airwheel M3 PRO Electric Skateboards Complete makes it come true.

title: Surfing on land? Airwheel M3 PRO Electric Skateboards Complete makes it come true.
text: Surfing on land? Airwheel M3 PRO Electric Skateboards Complete makes it come true. Do you like to play skateboard? When it comes to skateboard, many people think that it belongs to the young people. However, Airwheel Technology has released Airwheel M3 electric skateboard, which has nothing to do with age, and it is the flame of our hearts. M3 has concentrated on a more beautiful and stronger design to show love of skateboard. usa, 21 October 2015 -- When it comes to skateboard, many people think that it belongs to the young people. Have you ever heard electric skateboard ? However, Airwheel Technology has released Airwheel M3 electric skateboard, which has nothing to do with age, and it is the flame of our hearts. M3 has concentrated on a more beautiful and stronger design to show love of skateboard.The most attractive part of M3 is the DIY style. Maple electric skateboard M3 can be modified and realize personal "transformation.” You can experience more possibilities and travel freely. What’s more, it is controlled by remote control. With the 2.4 G wireless remote control, it can realize infinitely variable speeds and the effective distance reaches 10 meters. The remote control can control to go forward or backward Also, the wireless variable speed remote control has condensed wisdom with small size. The riders can easily hold everything in control and make life become active by giving full paly to your innovation. M3 wireless remote control skateboard is made of high-tech composite material and maple. Cheng Shin Tire makes M3 has better skid resistance and stronger grip effect. With unbeatable and potential performance, M3 make you surf on land care-freely. Moreover, the front and rear wheels have been equipped with TPU material damper mass to ensure riding more smoothly. Even a single module has problem, the whole system can work normally and efficiently, because they are working independently. Now, you can enjoy surfing on land freely, anywhere and anytime. M3 can make you lead a more brilliant life. The deeper you understand M3, the more you will find it is innovative in every aspect. M3 motorized skateboard makes you move ahead no matter your body or spirit. To play with DIY spirit, your life will become more wonderful and energetic. # # #
